price: A Mi smo Kur’an lahkim za opomenu učinili, pa ima li ikoga ko bi se prisjetio?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
